title: Input
description: Configuration for the Amazon POD Best Sellers scraper.

categoryUrls.title: Category URLs
categoryUrls.description: Array of category objects to crawl. Each object must include a short category name (e.g., women, men, girls, boys) and the absolute Amazon Best Sellers URL for that category.

category.title: Category key
category.description: Short category key used to tag results (e.g., women, men, girls, boys).

url.title: Category URL
url.description: Absolute URL of the Amazon Best Sellers page to crawl for this category.

pagesPerCategory.title: Pages per category (1–5)
pagesPerCategory.description: How many pagination pages to crawl per category. Keep small (3–5) to reduce blocking.

useApifyProxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
useApifyProxy.description: Enable Apify Proxy to rotate IPs and reduce 429 errors. Recommended.

proxyGroups.title: Proxy groups
proxyGroups.description: Apify proxy groups to use, e.g., RESIDENTIAL. Leave empty to use default datacenter pool.

maxBackoffMs.title: Max backoff (ms)
maxBackoffMs.description: Upper limit for exponential backoff delay when a 429 is encountered.
